details.title: STEM and Business Calculus
details.description: Developed and delivered material to medium sized classes. Designed, adminstered, and graded coordinated exam and quizzes.

company: Johns Hopkins Center for Talented Youth

details.title: Cryptology
details.description: Designed and implemented several three-week long courses in Cryptology for middle school aged students. Wrote personalized evaluations for each student focusing on their accomplishments and growth. Ended each session with a parent-instructor conference.
